about_the_game:
This once proud city has succumbed to crime, and now gangs and private military organizations rule the streets. In this new regime where danger lurks in every corner and strength and cunning are the key to survival, you seek to make a name and fortune for yourself.

Combat, Survival, Evacuation

  • Team up in squads of up to 3 players to take on other player squads and local gang forces.

  • Engage in fierce battles against elite enemies with special abilities to hunt down their rare drops.

  • Search for valuables in a perilous environment and ensure timely and safe evacuation.

Expansive Modern Urban Map

  • Explore, fight, and seek dominance in a massive 3km*3km map

  • Features a variety of terrain including a downtown urban area, suburbs, highways, mountains, rivers, and more.

  • Use buildings and terrain to gain a competitive advantage in battle or take cover.

Rich Variety of Weapons and Tactical Gear

  • Customize your weapons, modifying magazines, grips, silencers, trigger groups, scopes, and more to fine-tune your optimal shooting experience.

  • Acquire weapon skins and personalize your in-game style.

  • Discover a wide variety of support and tactical gear including medical, explosive, and equipment supply items.

Exciting Combat with High Mobility

  • Use parachutes and zip lines to navigate to and from high places, and quickly occupy advantageous positions by vaulting through windows or over low walls.

  • Drive land and water-based vehicles for rapid long-distance movement.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes scenes of violence including shooting firearms, deploying explosives, and blood. Game images are non photorealistic.

name: OUTLAWED

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64) - Windows 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: OUTLAWED is a crime-themed PvPvE first-person extraction shooter, set in a modern city overrun by gangs. Enter solo or with a squad to challenge powerful enemies and search for riches, and use everything at your disposal to make it out alive.
